io.wolfscript.NativeTranslateBridge.title: A Bridge class to adapt the native translation of Minecraft into the Wolf Translator.
io.wolfscript.NativeTranslateBridge.description: A Bridge class to adapt the native translation of Minecraft into the Wolf Translator. An implementation should implement the bridge into their projects and bridge it to the Minecraft translator. Plugineers should not implement or access this class directly. (The Rainbow)
io.wolfscript.NativeTranslateBridge.name: NativeTranslateBridge

properties.description: Get: Defines the total number PreparedStatements a DataSource will cache. The pool will destroy the least-recently-used PreparedStatement when it hits this limit.
properties.title: Get: Defines the total number PreparedStatements a DataSource will cache.

properties.name: MaxCachedStatementsPerConnection
properties.description: Get: Defines how many statements each pooled Connection is allowed to own. You can set this to a bit more than the number of PreparedStatements your application frequently uses, to avoid churning.

return: config for max num of pooled statements per connection

properties.title: Get: Defines how many statements each pooled Connection is allowed to own.

properties.name: NumStatementCloseThreads
properties.description: Get: If greater than zero, the Statement pool will defer physically close()ing cached Statements until its parent Connection is not in use by any client or internally (in e.g. a test) by the pool itself.

return: config num of threads used to defer closing statements

properties.title: Get: If greater than zero, the Statement pool will defer physically close()ing cached Statements

properties.description: Get: Defines the interval of checking validity of pooled connections in seconds.
properties.title: Get: Defines the interval of checking validity of pooled connections in seconds.

properties.name: ReturnConnectionTimeout
properties.description: Get: Defines the time in seconds a connection can stay checked out, before it is returned to the connection pool.

return: num of seconds a connection can stay checked out

properties.title: Get: Defines the time in seconds a connection can stay checked out, before it is returned to the connection pool.

properties.name: MaxPoolSize
properties.description: Get: Defines the maximum allowed number of connections in the connection pool.
properties.title: Get: Defines the maximum allowed number of connections in the connection pool.

properties.name: MaxExcessConnectionsIdleTime
properties.description: Get: Number of seconds that Connections in excess of minPoolSize should be permitted to remain idle in the pool before being culled. Set 0 to turn off culling
properties.title: Get: Number of seconds that Connections in excess of minPoolSize

properties.name: AcquireIncrement
properties.description: Get: Determines how many connections at a time to acquire when the pool is exhausted.
properties.title: Get: Determines how many connections at a time to acquire when the pool is exhausted.

properties.description: Get: Time to keep idle connections in the pool before they are closed and discarded.

io.wolfscript.event.system.UnloadWorldEv.title: Called before a world is unloaded.
io.wolfscript.event.system.UnloadWorldEv.description:
Called before a world is unloaded.
Before a world is unloaded, it will be saved! After a world is unloaded it will not be processed in the tick loop anymore. A world can not be unloaded if it still has players on it. For informational use - to give plugins a chance to null their references to that world, if they have any.
